Uses of Class
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.AbstractDatabaseManager

  • Packages that use AbstractDatabaseManager 
    Package Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db
    The classes in this package and sub packages provide appenders for various types of databases and methods for accessing databases.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jdbc
    The JDBC Appender supports writing log events to a relational database using standard JDBC connections.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.nosql
    The NoSQL Appender supports writing log events to NoSQL databases.

    • Uses of AbstractDatabaseManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db

      Classes in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db with type parameters of type AbstractDatabaseManager 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractDatabaseAppender<T extends AbstractDatabaseManager>
      An abstract Appender for writing events to a database of some type, be it relational or NoSQL.
      Methods in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db with type parameters of type AbstractDatabaseManager 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected static <M extends AbstractDatabaseManager,​T extends AbstractDatabaseManager.AbstractFactoryData>
      M      		 AbstractDatabaseManager.getManager​(String name, T data, ManagerFactory<M,​T> factory)
      Implementations should define their own getManager method and call this method from that to create or get existing managers.

    • Uses of AbstractDatabaseManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jdbc

      Subclasses of AbstractDatabaseManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.db.jdbc 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JdbcDatabaseManager
      An AbstractDatabaseManager implementation for relational databases accessed via JDBC.

    • Uses of AbstractDatabaseManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.nosql

      Subclasses of AbstractDatabaseManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.nosql 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NoSqlDatabaseManager<W>
      An AbstractDatabaseManager implementation for all NoSQL databases.
